messages.speech: Every time the application gets userinput, whether this showing it on screen or processing this data in the application background, these parameters should be escaped for malicious code in order to prevent crosssite scripting injections. When an attacker gains the possibility to perform an XSS injection, he is given the opportunity to inject HTML and JavaScript code directly into the application. This could lead to accounts being compromised by stealing session cookies or directly affect the operation of the target application.
